meanings.definition: A person who practices or studies Hermeticism.
meanings.sent1: The hermetists gathered to discuss ancient teachings.
meanings.sent2: Many hermetists believe in the power of alchemy.
meanings.sent3: The hermetists tried to unlock the secrets of the universe with their knowledge.
meanings.sent4: She was like a hermetist, delving into the mysteries of the cosmos.
meanings.sent5: The hermetists' dedication to learning was unmatched.

meanings.sent1: Several hermetists arrived at the convention together.
meanings.sent2: The hermetists shared their findings with each other.
meanings.sent3: The hermetists formed a circle to discuss their shared interests.
meanings.sent4: In the crowd, the hermetists stood out with their unique attire.
meanings.sent5: The hermetists' presence added an air of mystery to the room.
